parameter.name: nodeId
parameter.label: NodeId
parameter.description: The ID of the node in the MySensors network

parameter.name: childId
parameter.label: ChildId
parameter.description: The ID of the child of a node in the MySensors network

parameter.name: nodeUpdateTimeout
parameter.label: Expected Communication Timeout
parameter.description: Minutes after, if no message received, ALL things with same node ID will be set to OFFLINE

parameter.name: childUpdateTimeout
parameter.label: Expected Communication Timeout
parameter.description: Minutes after, if no message received, thing will be set to OFFLINE

parameter.name: requestHeartbeatResponse
parameter.label: Request Heartbeat Response
parameter.description: If no heartbeat received and no attempts left (see: sanCheckSendHeartbeatFailAttempts) ALL thing with same node ID will be set OFFLINE.

parameter.name: revertState
parameter.label: Revert State
parameter.description: Revert state if no Ack received

parameter.name: smartSleep
parameter.label: SmartSleep
parameter.description: Does this node support Smartsleep? A message to the node is only send in response to a heartbeat!
